name: Twin Run!
description:
It's a normal day for the Desir twins until the oldest twin Jo decides to bring home an old and very cracked video game disc for their Gamecube system that he bought off of someone in front of their favorite video game store. Wanting to reminisce in the good times of having and playing a Gamecube back in the day, Jo told his brother Kadir to play with him as the disc is put into the system. Suddenly, the Gamecube starts shaking, lights begin flashing on the TV screen, and Jo and Kadir are sucked into the game and have to play themselves out to get back into the real world!

Play as Jo or Kadir as they go through a fun and intense journey to find their way home! Travel through each world, collect numerous amounts of hairspray, jump and defeat villains, and help Jo and Kadir get back to the real world! Are you up for the challenge?
